import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T
from cryptography.fernet import Fernet
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
code:
@udf(returnType = StringType())
def encrypt(clear_text, MASTER_KEY):
    if not clear_text or clear_text == np.nan or pd.isna(clear_text) or \
        clear_text!=clear_text or not str(clear_text) or clear_text is None:
        clear_text = ''

    from cryptography.fernet import Fernet
    f = Fernet(MASTER_KEY)
    clear_text_b = bytes(clear_text, 'utf-8')
    cipher_text = f.encrypt(clear_text_b)
    cipher_text = str(cipher_text.decode('ascii'))
    return cipher_text
